0_fool.name: The Fool

love.upright: New romantic adventure awaits. Take a leap of faith in love. Trust your heart and be open to unexpected encounters. Perfect time for innocent, pure romance.
love.reversed: Fear of romantic commitment or being too reckless in love. Either holding back from relationships or jumping in too quickly without thought.

career.upright: Exciting new career opportunity. Time to take professional risks and follow your passion. Fresh start or entrepreneurial venture beckons.
career.reversed: Lack of career planning or being too impulsive with professional decisions. Need more preparation before making major work changes.

money.upright: New financial opportunities on the horizon. Optimistic money outlook with potential for investment or income growth. Trust in abundance.
money.reversed: Financial recklessness or excessive caution with money. Poor financial planning or fear of taking necessary economic risks.

health.upright: Fresh start with health and wellness. New exercise routine or holistic healing approach. Youthful energy and vitality returning.
health.reversed: Neglecting health needs or taking dangerous health risks. Need more careful planning with wellness decisions.

0_fool.promptContext: The Fool represents new beginnings and unlimited potential. In readings, emphasize the energy of fresh starts and trusting the journey ahead.

1_magician.name: The Magician

love.upright: You have the power to manifest the love you desire. Use your charm and communication skills. Take initiative in romantic situations.
love.reversed: Manipulative behavior in relationships or someone trying to deceive you in love. Dishonesty or using others for personal gain.

career.upright: Excellent leadership abilities and professional skills. Time to take charge of your career. Successful projects and networking opportunities.
career.reversed: Misuse of professional power or workplace manipulation. Scattered focus preventing career progress. Unused talents and potential.

money.upright: Financial manifestation power is strong. Wise use of resources and successful investments. Money-making opportunities through skills.
money.reversed: Financial deception or get-rich-quick schemes. Mismanagement of resources. Need to focus financial energy more effectively.

health.upright: Taking control of your health with effective treatments. Strong mind-body connection. Healing energy and wellness manifestation.
health.reversed: Ignoring health issues or unrealistic health goals. Ineffective treatments or health-related deception.

1_magician.promptContext: The Magician represents personal power and the ability to manifest desires. Focus on taking action and using available resources.

2_high_priestess.name: The High Priestess

love.upright: Trust your intuition in love matters. Deep spiritual connection with partner. Hidden aspects of relationships will be revealed.
love.reversed: Ignoring romantic red flags or gut feelings. Secrets in relationships. Disconnected from emotional needs and desires.

career.upright: Trust professional instincts. Behind-the-scenes influence at work. Research, counseling, or spiritual work may be highlighted.
career.reversed: Office politics or hidden workplace agendas. Ignoring gut feelings about job situations. Need to reconnect with professional intuition.

money.upright: Trust financial instincts and hidden money opportunities. Intuitive investment decisions. Look beyond surface financial information.
money.reversed: Financial secrets or hidden money problems. Poor money intuition. Ignoring financial red flags or warning signs.

health.upright: Trust your body's wisdom and inner healing knowledge. Alternative healing methods. Strong mind-body awareness.
health.reversed: Ignoring body signals or symptoms. Disconnected from physical needs. Suppressed health issues requiring attention.

2_high_priestess.promptContext: The High Priestess represents inner wisdom and intuition. Encourage the querent to look within and trust their instincts.

3_empress.name: The Empress

love.reversed: Codependent relationships or smothering behavior. Fertility challenges. Neglecting self-love and personal needs in romance.

career.upright: Creative career flourishing. Nurturing work environment. Business growth and professional abundance. Artistic projects succeeding.
career.reversed: Creative blocks at work. Unsupportive work environment. Lack of professional growth opportunities. Career burnout from overgiving.

money.upright: Financial abundance and growth. Money flowing naturally. Profitable investments. Generous approach to wealth sharing.
money.reversed: Financial lack or blocks to money flow. Overspending on others. Economic codependency. Need to nurture personal financial health.

health.upright: Vibrant physical health. Fertility and reproductive health strong. Natural healing approaches. Excellent self-care practices.
health.reversed: Neglecting self-care and physical needs. Fertility or feminine health issues. Health problems from lack of nurturing.

4_emperor.name: The Emperor

love.reversed: Controlling or domineering partner. Power struggles in relationships. Lack of commitment or emotional availability.

career.upright: Leadership position or authority at work. Structured professional environment. Career stability and success through discipline.
career.reversed: Workplace tyranny or abuse of authority. Overly rigid professional environment. Problems with bosses or authority figures.

money.upright: Financial stability and structure. Disciplined money management. Successful long-term investments and wealth building.
money.reversed: Financial control issues or rigid budgeting. Abuse of economic power. Unstable money situation requiring more structure.

health.upright: Disciplined health routine. Strong physical constitution. Taking authoritative approach to wellness and fitness.
health.reversed: Ignoring medical authority or health advice. Overly rigid health approaches. Control issues affecting physical well-being.
